import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import logo from '../resources/images/msg5364238833-27433.png.jpg' import {changeLanguage} from '../store/slice/userReducer' function Header(props) { const {lang} = useSelector(state=>state.userReducer); const dispatch = useDispatch(); function changeLang(e){ dispatch(changeLanguage(e.target.value)) } return (

{lang === 'uz' ? "Sport qo'llanma" : lang === 'eng' ? "Sports guide" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Darslar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Lessons" : ""}

{lang === 'uz' ? "Darslar" : lang === 'eng' ? "Lessons" : ""}

); } export default Header;
